overview:
Passionate, Thoughtful and Self driven with Business acumen and Entrepreneurial zeal. I want to leverage my skills, experience and strengths towards building and growing business with aggressive velocity.

Result-oriented business leader with 13 years of experience in the areas of Business Development, Product Management, Sales, Alliances, Strategy and Execution in the Wireless, Internet and Software services space.

Career Mission:

To build/lead an organization providing world class services to its customers through an enjoyable work culture. An organization whose stakeholders (Employees, Customers, Investors, Business Associates, Government, Society) are proud to be associated with it.

To contribute in the overall growth of 3Pâ€™s - Profit, People & Processes of an organization through a process of continuous learning.
